import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import Header from '../Layer/Header' import MainContent from './MainContent' import CategoryWiseContent from './CategoryWiseContent' import api_call from '../../utils/apiHelper/apiCall' import { home_page_api_url } from '../../utils/apiHelper/apiUrl' import { BASE_URL } from '../../utils/constants/constants' const Home = () => { const [articles, setArticles] = useState(null) useEffect(() => { const API_URL = BASE_URL + home_page_api_url + '?country=in&apiKey=' + process.env.REACT_APP_API_KEY console.log('apiUrl', API_URL) const articleData = api_call(API_URL, 'GET') const articles = articleData?.articles console.log(articles) setArticles(articles) }, []) if (!articles) return return (
) } export default Home
